item.description:
TROY BROWN AND FRIENDS - Jazzy at once, then funky, then soulful -- TROY BROWN is an enchanting personality and talented song stylist who'll get you off your feet. Troy and his exquisitely talented musicians make every performance a party! . Showtime's at 8:30.

The last time we saw Troy, we had a blast...had everyone on their feet and dancing!!!
Come join us for terrific jazz and great company. See you there!

BTW...Troy will be at my party on the 21st of August...come preview him here. I promise you will love him!!!!!!
item.name: Troy Brown @ The Side Walk Cafe...
